description: Generate a boilerplate starter-kit codebase from a single prompt.
title: Marblism - Launch your React and Node.js app in minutes
introduction: Marblism is a tool designed to simplify the app development process by automating the initial setup tasks such as picking frameworks, setting up authentication, and connecting the front-end to the back-end. It allows developers to focus on adding their unique touch to the app by just describing their app idea.
features: Allows developers to focus on unique features
